search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Less Annoying CRM (less-annoying-crm.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: Here is the official pricing page for Less Annoying CRM: [https://www.lessannoyingcrm.com/pricing](https://www.lessannoyingcrm.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Pricing
=======

Yes, that's really it.

For the first time, I have a CRM that I completely understand and can navigate.

![Image 39: William Hammett](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb25de94cee6c29635fe867/5efd062b4e274016231bcd4b_william_hammett.jpg)

William Hammett

Hammett Marketing Group LLC

Any sales team can figure this one out without lengthy training. Pipelines can be built within minutes.

![Image 40: Mike headshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb25de94cee6c29635fe867/5efd2a3df0651c1490c44286_mike_barclay.jpg)

Mike Barclay

SHIPHAUS

Less Annoying CRM
-----------------

per user/per month + tax

$15

Includes:

![Image 43: Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb25de94cee6c29635fe867/660b943b0a4e24b200d19972_Ok.svg)

Unlimited contacts and companies

![Image 44: Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb25de94cee6c29635fe867/660b943b0a4e24b200d19972_Ok.svg)

Unlimited pipelines

![Image 45: Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb25de94cee6c29635fe867/660b943b0a4e24b200d19972_Ok.svg)

Email logging

![Image 46: Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb25de94cee6c29635fe867/660b943b0a4e24b200d19972_Ok.svg)

User permissions

![Image 47: Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb25de94cee6c29635fe867/660b943b0a4e24b200d19972_Ok.svg)

Unlimited custom fields

![Image 48: Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb25de94cee6c29635fe867/660b943b0a4e24b200d19972_Ok.svg)

25GB of file storage per user

![Image 49: Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb25de94cee6c29635fe867/660b943b0a4e24b200d19972_Ok.svg)

![Image 50: Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb25de94cee6c29635fe867/660b943b0a4e24b200d19972_Ok.svg)

Mobile access

![Image 51: Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb25de94cee6c29635fe867/660b943b0a4e24b200d19972_Ok.svg)

All features &  free upgrades

[Try it risk-free for 30 days](https://account.lessannoyingcrm.com/signup/?bento_uuid=c93a143e-afe1-482c-85de-ffb5ffb94cff)

![Image 52: business using crm illustration](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb25de94cee6c29635fe867/660b99980a4e24b200d6080f_10%2B%20Image.png)

Planning to have 10+ users?
---------------------------

We offer free personalized help to every customer, regardless of size, but we know that sometimes larger accounts have more sophisticated needs that might require a bit more discussion and planning before signing up.

If you'd like to talk through your needs, please email us at [enterprise@lessannoyingcrm.com.](mailto:enterprise@lessannoyingcrm.com?subject=Pricing%20(10%2B%20Users))

Actual customer service

Get support from real people, always
------------------------------------

Less Annoying CRM is proud to have the highest-rated customer support in the industry. Whenever you reach out, you’re guaranteed to be talking with a real LACRM pro. No annoying chatbots or AI call centers here.

[Learn more](https://www.lessannoyingcrm.com/help)[Get Started](https://account.lessannoyingcrm.com/signup/?bento_uuid=c93a143e-afe1-482c-85de-ffb5ffb94cff)

![Image 53: Less Annoying CRM teammates smiling at camera](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb25de94cee6c29635fe867/660f20e3bdca7bbb5c0b27d1_Placeholder%20Image.webp)

![Image 54: blue background image with dots](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb25de94cee6c29635fe867/660b9ce27aebf0a9070a1b41_Image%20container.png)

![Image 55: Photo of all the Less Annoying CRM team](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb25de94cee6c29635fe867/660f1eebbdca7bbb5c096001_lacrm%20team%20gif.gif)

FAQs
----

LACRM's free trial features

With the free trial, you can use the software for one month for free, no questions asked, no hassles, no limitations.

[Read article](https://www.lessannoyingcrm.com/help/free-trial)

Contact storage limits

We don’t place any strict limits on the number of contacts and companies you can enter into Less Annoying CRM, but a good rule of thumb is to try to stay below 50,000 total.

[Read article](https://www.lessannoyingcrm.com/help/how-many-contacts-and-companies-can-i-have-in-my-crm)

Account ownership

Learn more about LACRM's account ownership policy.

[Read article](https://www.lessannoyingcrm.com/help/account-ownership)

LACRM's training and support

Less Annoying CRM comes with free email and phone support, even if you're not a paying customer.

[Read article](https://www.lessannoyingcrm.com/help/training-and-support)

Accessing LACRM

Less Annoying CRM is cloud-based, which means that you can access the CRM from any device as long as you have access to the internet or a data plan.

[Read article](https://www.lessannoyingcrm.com/help/cloud-based-how-to-access-crm)

LACRM's data security

Less Annoying CRM is hosted on Amazon Web Services—AWS, for short—in their North Virginia datacenter.

[Read article](https://www.lessannoyingcrm.com/help/data-security-and-backups)

### Still have questions?

If you can’t find the answers you need, or just want to learn more about Less Annoying CRM, get in touch!

[Contact](https://account.lessannoyingcrm.com/contact/?bento_uuid=c93a143e-afe1-482c-85de-ffb5ffb94cff)

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is straightforward with a single tier and no hidden fees.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Single pricing tier for all users.
